sentence: move the left blue block to the rear left side of the block that you just moved before
move the left blue block to the rear left side of the purple block
move the leftmost blue block to the rear left of the last moved block so that it touches the block's rear left corner at its front right corner
move the leftmost blue block to the left behind the purple block so that its front right corner touches the purple block's rear left corner
pick up the farthest blue block from the moved blocks and place it to the rear left corner of the purple block
